title: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    57th Commemoration Event with Oliver Stone   8 Photos  Academy Award-winning director Oliver Stone, Dr. Peter Kuznick, and Dr. Eric Singer took part in the Reel Civil Rights Film Festival held to commemorate the 57th anniversary of the desegregation of Little Rock Central High School. The night included a screening of an episode of their collaborative documentary 'Untold History of the United States' which was followed by a moderated discussion, audience question and answer period, and book signing.          Visitor Center Construction   25 Photos            Central High School Photo Tour   9 Photos
